modName: Saber Lily - Caliburn Armor for UNPB
summary: Add female armor, based on character \"Saber Lily\" from Fate Stay Series, Support Bouncing Breast Animation from Cherry\'s system (CHSBHC) or BBP
descriptionHtml:
Another Upgraded version for Saber outfit is linked below
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35454/]Saber Lily - Caliburn Armor Improvement for UNPB BBP[/url]

[center]
REQUIREMENT
=============
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]UNPB-BBP[/url]
[color=orange]You will got CTD without the BBP skeleton[/color]

UPDATE
=======
Add Dark Texture Version

v1.0
- Support Body Slider
- Adjust texture for some equipment
- Fix Weight problem in many aspect (e.g gauntlets in 1st person)
- Fix Ground equipment item
- Many more since add body slider Show me where I got wrong
- Made the armor look more \"shiny\" as steel
- Gauntlet and Boots now aren\'t using JackGa meshes/textures but independently from Norakuro\'s
- Now All part of armor will available under Steel forge, of course you\'ll need Steel Smith Perk
- Fix missing textures issue
- Add New made Accessories 
- Rename \"Boots\" to \"Leggings\"
- Trying to fix weight paint as best as I could for quality
- Support Bouncing Breast Animation from Cherry\'s system (CHSBHC) or BBP
- Please enjoy. I put many hours on this one

For Who ask for Another Body, I don\'t plan to do any since I don\'t have motivation or likely request for that will have null reply

DESCRIPTION
===========
Base on character \"Saber Lily\'s\" outfit which has appeared in the anime and manga versions of Fate/stay night and the movie Unlimited Blade Works. Three of versions of Saber (Saber, Saber Alter, Saber Lily) appeared in the Fate/unlimited codes. Saber (???? Seib??) is a fictional character from the Japanese visual novel and anime series Fate/stay night by TYPE-MOON and its prequel, Fate/zero by TYPE-MOON and nitroplus.

Saber Lily is an alternate version of Saber featured in Fate/unlimited codes as an unlockable alternate costume. She was designed by Takashi Takeuchi as another form of the King of Knights with an \"emphasis on her girlishness.\" In contrast to the blackened Saber Alter, she is called the pure and sweet \"Princess of Knights\" who is shown to carry Caliburn rather than Excalibur. Her design was inspired by the dress Caster placed on Saber after she was captured during Unlimited Blade Works. The design was filled with the feminine qualities that Saber lacks, and \"Lily\" in her name refers to her skirt being designed to resemble the petals of a lily flower. She has no background information within unlimited codes or other side materials, but Nasu Kinoko and Gen Urobuchi joke about her being a version of Saber fully tamed by Caster during a discussion. She has appeared in a number of promotional images with Saber, Saber Alter, and Red Saber. 

[img]http://www5.picturepush.com/photo/a/5495438/1024/Picture-Box/Fate-Stay-Night-Saber-Lily-01.png[/img][/center]
[color=Grey][center]Files provided here is simply for fans (my self included) works for \"Saber Lily character\'s outfit\" from Fate series .
As the original mod creator \"Norakuro\" isn\'t prohibite for modification and has given permission for the files. If in the future happen that the author claim for his work, this files will be removed for download[/center][/color]

It consist of six useable parts from total of seven
- Caliburn Lily Dress
- Caliburn Chest armor or Caliburn Breast Plate 
- Caliburn Waist Plate
- Caliburn Gauntles
- Caliburn Leggings
- Caliburn Lily Accessories

[center]
[youtube]q4ZxOv9gs64[/youtube][/center]

RECOMMENDED
==============
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13929]Sabers Swords[/url]
